title: Support rendering rich text into issue description
description: Currently there's isn't any way that I cannot markup or highlight some important phrases in an issue description. It's better to have this feature.

title: Issue list is not responding when the number of issues is getting huge big
description: I write a small script to massively create issues. Lately, I can not access the issue list anymore.

title: Issues are duplicated while doing a monkey test on 'Open issue' button
description: Many duplicated issues are unexpectedly created when constantly clicking on 'Open Issue' button.
